name: Enduring Debilitation
trigger: You apply a debilitation to a creature.
desc: You can make your debilitation last an exceptionally long time. The triggering debilitation lasts for 1 minute instead of until the end of your next turn.

name: Invulnerable Juggernaut
inputRequired: Activate this activity instead of applying the damage that would reduce you to 0 Hit Points.
trigger: You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points.
desc: You end your rage to stay at 1 Hit Point. You become wounded 2 (or increase your wounded condition by 2 if you are already wounded).
